trans-unit.source: Represents a digital signature that is applied to a set of package parts and relationships.
trans-unit.target: 패키지 파트 및 관계 집합에 적용되는 디지털 서명을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> object is immutable and cannot be altered after it is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> 개체는 변경할 수 및 만들어진 후에 변경할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: For security, a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> can be associated with parts within a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: 보안을 위해 한 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> 내의 파트에 연결할 수는 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> incorporates an X.509 certificate that provides two features:
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> 두 기능을 제공 하는 X.509 인증서를 통합 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies and authenticates the originator of the part.
Validates that the part has not been modified.
The digital signature does not preclude a part from being modified, but a validation check against the signature fails if the part has changed in any way.
trans-unit.target: 디지털 서명을 수정 하지 못하도록 부품을 방해 하지 않는 있지만 부품 어떤 식으로든에서 변경 된 경우 서명 대 한 유효성 검사가 실패 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The application can then take appropriate action—for example, it can prevent the part from opening or it can notify the user that the part has been modified and is not secure.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램이 적절 한 조치를 취할 수-예를 들어 부품 열리지에서 않을 수 있습니다 또는 파트 수정 되었는지 및 안전 하지 않은 사용자를 알릴 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about package digital signatures, see the MSDN article [Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
trans-unit.target: 패키지 디지털 서명에 대 한 자세한 내용은 MSDN 문서를 참조 하십시오. [디지털 서명 프레임 워크를 Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate embedding option.
One of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption" /> values that specifies the option for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 디지털 서명에 대한 옵션을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption" /> 값 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificates used to validate a package may be stored in one of three locations:
trans-unit.target: 패키지의 유효성을 검사 하는 데 사용 되는 X.509 인증서는 세 위치 중 하나에 저장 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: In its own certificate <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> in the package.
The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: X.509 인증서를 통해 가져올 수는 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Within the content of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignaturePart%2A> in the package.
The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: X.509 인증서를 통해 가져올 수는 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: External to the package in a location known by both the application that creates the signature and the application that later uses the signature for validation.
trans-unit.target: 서명을 만드는 응용 프로그램과 응용 프로그램에 알려진 위치에 패키지 외부 하는 나중에 서명을 유효성 검사에 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The digital <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" /> has been deleted.
The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> to return the transform list for.
Returns an ordered list of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform" /> operations applied to a given part.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 파트에 적용되는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform" /> 작업의 순서 지정된 목록을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An ordered list of URI strings, such as <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigCanonicalizationUrl" /> or <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl" />, that represents the canonical XML transformations applied to the part with the given <paramref name="partName" /> URI.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <paramref name="partName" /> URI의 파트에 적용되는 정식 XML 변환을 나타내는 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigCanonicalizationUrl" /> 또는 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl" />과 같은 URI 문자열의 순서 지정된 목록입니다.

trans-unit.source: The digital <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" /> has been deleted.
Gets or sets the XML digital signature.
The XML digital signature.

<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature%2A> provides access to the foundation class that performs type-specific signature cryptographic functions and serialization to and from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> that hosts the signature.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature%2A> 유형별 서명 암호화 기능 및 직렬화를 수행 하는 기본 클래스에 대 한 액세스를 제공는 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> 서명을 호스팅하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The digital <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" /> has been deleted.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> that contains the signature.
The package part that contains the signature.
The signature's package part is frequently accessed when the signature is countersigned.
trans-unit.target: 서명을 연대 서명할 서명의 패키지 파트 자주 액세스 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The digital <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" /> has been deleted.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
The default is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl" />.
The digital <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" /> has been deleted.
Gets the encrypted hash value of the <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" />.
A byte array that contains the encrypted hash value of the <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" />의 암호화된 해시 값이 포함된 바이트 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The digital <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" /> has been deleted.
Gets a collection of all the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> objects signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: 서명된 모든 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> 개체의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all the package parts signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: 서명된 모든 패키지 파트가 포함된 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The digital <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" /> has been deleted.
Gets the list of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> parts that have been signed with the signature.
The list of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> parts that have been signed with the signature.
The digital <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" /> has been deleted.
Gets the X.509 certificate of the signer.
The digital certificate of the signer, or <see langword="null" /> if the certificate is not stored in the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: 서명자의 디지털 인증서, 또는 인증서가 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />에 저장되지 않은 경우에는 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> returns the X.509 certificate of the signer when the digital certificate is stored within the package (that is, when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption.InCertificatePart> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption.InSignaturePart>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> 패키지 내에서 디지털 인증서가 저장 될 때에 서명자의 X.509 인증서를 반환 합니다 (즉, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A> 은 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption.InCertificatePart> 또는 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption.InSignaturePart>).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> returns `null` when the X.509 certificate is not stored in the package (that is, when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption.NotEmbedded>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> 반환 `null` 때 X.509 인증서가 패키지에 저장 되지 않습니다 (즉, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A> 은 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption.NotEmbedded>).

trans-unit.source: The digital <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" /> has been deleted.
Gets the date and time that the signature was created.
The date and time that the signature was created.
The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.TimeFormat%2A> property specifies the format of the date.

The format of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime%2A> string is based on the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property in effect when the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: 형식은 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime%2A> 기반 문자열은 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성 서명을 생성 하는 경우에 적용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime%2A> is based on the system time of the computer where the signing took place.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime%2A> 여기서는 서명이 수행 하는 컴퓨터의 시스템 시간에 기반 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime%2A> is not a "secure TimeStamp" and is not from trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime%2A> "보안 타임 스탬프" 아니며 신뢰할 수 있는 타임 스탬프 기관에서 가져오지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: A secure TimeStamp must be obtained and applied through a trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: 안전한 타임 스탬프를 구한 신뢰할 수 있는 타임 스탬프 기관을 통해 적용 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The digital <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" /> has been deleted.
Gets the format of the date and time returned by the <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime" /> 속성에서 반환된 날짜와 시간의 형식을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The format of the date and time returned by the <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime" /> property.
Date/time formats follow the syntax of the W3C [Date and Time Formats](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446) note.
trans-unit.target: 날짜/시간 형식은 W3C의 구문을 따릅니다 [날짜 및 시간 형식](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446) 참고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The components shown in the following table must use the syntax and punctuation shown.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에 표시 된 구성 요소는 구문 및 문장 부호 표시를 사용 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: TimeFormat
Description
Example
YYYY
Year
YYYY-MM
Year and month
YYYY-MM-DD
Complete date
YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD
Complete date plus hours and minutes
YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD
Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds
trans-unit.target: 완료 날짜 및 시간, 분 및 초

trans-unit.source: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD
Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds with a decimal fraction
trans-unit.target: 완료 날짜 및 시간, 분 및 초 소수 부분

trans-unit.source: where:
YYYY
four-digit year (for example 2006)
MM
two-digit month (01=January)
DD
two-digit day of month (01 through 31)
Thh
two-digit hour (00 through 23, 24-hour time)
mm
two digits of minutes (00 through 59)
ss
two digits of seconds (00 through 59)
s
one or more digits representing a decimal fraction of a second
trans-unit.target: 초 소수 부분을 나타내는 하나 이상의 숫자

trans-unit.source: TZD
time zone designator (Z or +hh:mm or -hh:mm)
trans-unit.target: 표준 시간대 지정자 (Z 나 + hh: mm 또는-hh: mm)

trans-unit.source: The digital <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" /> has been deleted.
Verifies the digital signature against an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: X.509 인증서에 대한 디지털 서명을 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the digital signature against an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: X.509 인증서에 대한 디지털 서명을 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult.Success" /> if the verification succeeded; otherwise, one of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult" /> values that identifies a problem.
trans-unit.target: 인증에 성공하면 <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult.Success" />, 그렇지 않으면 문제를 식별하는 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult" /> 값 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies the signature against an embedded X.509 certificate stored in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 포함 된 X.509 인증서에 저장 하 여 서명을 확인는 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The digital <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" /> has been deleted.
The signer's X.509 certificate to verify the digital signature against.
trans-unit.target: 디지털 서명을 확인하기 위한 서명자의 X.509 인증서입니다.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the digital signature against a given X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 X.509 인증서에 대해 디지털 서명을 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult.Success" /> if the verification succeeded; otherwise, one of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult" /> values that identifies a problem.
trans-unit.target: 인증에 성공하면 <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult.Success" />, 그렇지 않으면 문제를 식별하는 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult" /> 값 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: The digital <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature" /> has been deleted.
